segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, water floods from the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, oblivious as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, soaking her apron perhaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, the boy's on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilting as he grabs from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, excited for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the tension of the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view mocks the interior mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to slips and falls easily.
segments.speaker: PAR
